title: Flawed Hero
description: IT WAS A BIT OF A CULTURE SHOCKEspecially to Abby, a lifelong landlubber, who now found herself running a cruise business in Granada. Of course it was only temporary --- just until she helped her aunt sort out a few problems she was having with the locals.Problem number one was Josh Donner, the wickedly attractive owner of the only rival firm on the island.What Abby hadn't bargained for was the devastating effect Josh would have on her. Could she trust a word he said?
author: Elizabeth Oldfield
